name: Bubble Sky
description:
ap, tap and Tap to fly! Navigate your Beautifull character through the Arena of BUBBLE by evading all obstacles and hurdles coming for you. Collect valuable stars and coins to free all Bubbles captured in BUBBLE Sky
Be brave and bold, but don’t crash!
Dob't Touch with Obstacles.
Avoid all hurdles.
Move your bubble to the top Level
If you do, your bubble pops and you have to start all over again.
Smooth one tap control -
Endless Arcade fun -
3 cute characters -
Unique visuals anbd Graphics -
High quality Graphics and artwork
